scripts.serve:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production PORT=5030 ORIGIN=http://localhost:5030 node --import tsx/esm ./build/server/index.js
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--import tsx/esm" vite build --outDir build/client --manifest && npm run build:seria
scripts.build:server: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--import tsx/esm" vite build --outDir build/server --ssr
